ROOT.GetBaseData: select RQ,FAREA,DATA_0,DATA_1,DATA_2,DATA_3,DATA_4,DATA_5,DATA_6,DATA_7,DATA_8,DATA_9,DATA_10,DATA_11,DATA_12,DATA_13,DATA_14,DATA_15,DATA_16,DATA_17,DATA_18,DATA_19,DATA_20,DATA_21,DATA_22,DATA_23,DL from same:SchemeT_MGD_BASEDATA_NEW A JOIN (SELECT MAX(JSRQ) JSRQ,FAREA FAREA1 FROM same:SchemeT_MGD_BASEDATA_NEW WHERE RQ=SUBSTR({0},0,10) AND AREA='-' AND PBFLAG={1} GROUP BY FAREA) B ON A.JSRQ=B.JSRQ AND A.FAREA=B.FAREA1 WHERE RQ=SUBSTR({0},0,10) AND AREA='-' AND PBFLAG={1}
ROOT.GetData: select RQ,FAREA,DATA_0,DATA_1,DATA_2,DATA_3,DATA_4,DATA_5,DATA_6,DATA_7,DATA_8,DATA_9,DATA_10,DATA_11,DATA_12,DATA_13,DATA_14,DATA_15,DATA_16,DATA_17,DATA_18,DATA_19,DATA_20,DATA_21,DATA_22,DATA_23,DL from same:SchemeT_MGD_DATA_NEW WHERE AREA='-' AND RQ=SUBSTR({0},0,10) AND PBFLAG={1}
ROOT.GetGridBaseData: select TOP 1 DATA_0,DATA_1,DATA_2,DATA_3,DATA_4,DATA_5,DATA_6,DATA_7,DATA_8,DATA_9,DATA_10,DATA_11,DATA_12,DATA_13,DATA_14,DATA_15,DATA_16,DATA_17,DATA_18,DATA_19,DATA_20,DATA_21,DATA_22,DATA_23 from same:SchemeT_MGD_BASEDATA_NEW A WHERE A.RQ=SUBSTR({0},0,10) AND AREA='-' AND PBFLAG='0' AND FAREA='全网' ORDER BY JSRQ DESC
ROOT.GetGridData: select DATA_0,DATA_1,DATA_2,DATA_3,DATA_4,DATA_5,DATA_6,DATA_7,DATA_8,DATA_9,DATA_10,DATA_11,DATA_12,DATA_13,DATA_14,DATA_15,DATA_16,DATA_17,DATA_18,DATA_19,DATA_20,DATA_21,DATA_22,DATA_23 from same:SchemeT_MGD_DATA_NEW WHERE AREA='-' AND RQ=SUBSTR({0},0,10) AND PBFLAG=0 AND FAREA='全网'
ROOT.GetUserStat: select (SELECT TO_CHAR(SUM((TRIM(NVL(CNUMBER,0))))) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT QYNAME,ZQYNAME,CDWNAME,CNUMBER FROM same:SchemeV_MGD_BASEINFO where 1=1 )) as COUNTRY_NUM, (select to_char(nvl(sum(HNUMBER),0)) from same:SchemeV_MGD_BASEINFO where isNumeric(HNUMBER)=1 ) as HOME_NUM, (select to_char(nvl(sum(to_number(trim(DWNUMBER))),0)) from same:SchemeV_MGD_BASEINFO where isNumeric(DWNUMBER)=1 ) as ORGAN_NUM, (select to_char(count(DISTINCT PBID)) from same:SchemeV_MGD_BASEINFO WHERE 1=1 ) as PB_NUM from dual
ROOT.GetPathStat: select FAREA, count(distinct acline_id_10)as XL_10, count(distinct acline_id_35) as XL_35, count(distinct acline_id_110) as XL_110, count(distinct zb_name_35) as ZB_35, count(distinct zb_name_110) as ZB_110, count(distinct zb_name_220) as ZB_220 from same:SchemeV_MGD_PATH_PB where PB_ID_D5000 in (select pbid from same:SchemeV_MGD_BASEINFO where 1=1 ) GROUP BY FAREA
ROOT.GetCNumberStat: SELECT QYNAME,TO_CHAR(SUM((TRIM(NVL(CNUMBER,0))))) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT QYNAME,ZQYNAME,CDWNAME,CNUMBER FROM same:SchemeV_MGD_BASEINFO where 1=1 ) GROUP BY QYNAME
ROOT.GetHNumberStat: select qyname,to_char(nvl(sum(HNUMBER),0)) from same:SchemeV_MGD_BASEINFO where isNumeric(HNUMBER)=1 group by qyname
ROOT.GetDwNumberStat: select qyname,to_char(nvl(sum(DWNUMBER),0)) from same:SchemeV_MGD_BASEINFO where isNumeric(DWNUMBER)=1 group by qyname
ROOT.GetPbStat: select qyname,to_char(count(DISTINCT PBID)) from same:SchemeV_MGD_BASEINFO WHERE 1=1 group by qyname
ROOT.GetStationInfo: select LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,v.name,s.type,s.id,s.name,s.OPERATE_DATE,v.code,s.DCC_ID,s.PG_ID,s.OPERATE_STATE,s.OWNER from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B s LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v ON s.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code where ID IN ( select DCLOUD_ST_ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_PWRTRANSFM_C where D5000_ID IN (SELECT TR_1_ID FROM same:MgdSchemePOWER_TRACE_ROUTE) OR D5000_ID IN (SELECT TR_2_ID FROM same:MgdSchemePOWER_TRACE_ROUTE) OR D5000_ID IN (SELECT TR_3_ID FROM same:MgdSchemePOWER_TRACE_ROUTE) )
ROOT.GetPlantInfo: select LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,v.name,PLANT_TYPE,s.id,s.name,s.OPERATE_DATE,v.code,s.DCC_ID,s.CONNECTIVE_PG_ID,s.OPERATE_STATE,s.OWNER from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B s LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v ON s.MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code where ID IN ( select DCLOUD_ST_ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_PWRTRANSFM_C where D5000_ID IN (SELECT TR_1_ID FROM same:MgdSchemePOWER_TRACE_ROUTE) OR D5000_ID IN (SELECT TR_2_ID FROM same:MgdSchemePOWER_TRACE_ROUTE) OR D5000_ID IN (SELECT TR_3_ID FROM same:MgdSchemePOWER_TRACE_ROUTE) )
ROOT.GetConverInfo: select LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,v.name,3001,s.id,s.name,s.OPERATE_DATE,v.code,s.DCC_ID,S.PG_ID,s.OPERATE_STATE,s.OWNER from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B s LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v ON s.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code where ID IN ( select DCLOUD_ST_ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_PWRTRANSFM_C where D5000_ID IN (SELECT TR_1_ID FROM same:MgdSchemePOWER_TRACE_ROUTE) OR D5000_ID IN (SELECT TR_2_ID FROM same:MgdSchemePOWER_TRACE_ROUTE) OR D5000_ID IN (SELECT TR_3_ID FROM same:MgdSchemePOWER_TRACE_ROUTE) )
ROOT.GetD5000LineId: select D5000LINEID from same:MgdSchemeT_MGD_BASEINFO where xtid={0}
ROOT.GetYearData: select rq,farea,maxfhcha from same:SchemeT_MGD_HIS_NEW where AREA='-' and rq >= SUBSTR('{0}',0,10) and rq <= SUBSTR('{1}',0,10) and pbflag='0' order by rq
ROOT.GetYearDataQW: select rq,maxfh from same:SchemeT_MGD_HIS_NEW where AREA='-' and rq >= SUBSTR('{0}',0,10) and rq <= SUBSTR('{1}',0,10) and pbflag='0' AND farea='全网' order by rq
ROOT.GetPrevDayMaxMgd: select farea,maxfhcha from same:SchemeT_MGD_HIS_NEW where AREA='-' and rq == SUBSTR('{0}',0,10) and pbflag={1}
